articles.title: Generic protocol for COVID-19 vaccine effectiveness studies at long-term care facilities in the EU/EEA - European Centre for Disease
articles.description: This protocol outlines the methods for a prospective cohort study in long-term care facilities (LTCFs) to evaluate the effectiveness of COVID-19 vaccines in preventing laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 symptomatic infection in LTCF residents.
articles.content: The end of 2019 saw the emergence of the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), which causes coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). By early August 2022, over 160 million cases a… [+2280 chars]

articles.title: First water map of Mars could help NASA choose where to land in the future - Daily Mail
articles.description: Scientists from the European Space Agency (ESA) have created the first water map of Mars, based on data from its Mars Express Observatory and NASA's Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter.
articles.content:

articles.title: Falconets not stranded in Turkey- NFF secretary - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The General Secretary of the Nigeria Football Federation, Dr Mohammed Sanusi, says the Falconets missed their flight from Istanbul, Turkey to Nigeria, adding that they were not stranded in the European nation.

articles.title: Mortgage misery as ECB now set for two more hikes by the end of the year - Independent.ie
articles.description: The European Central Bank (ECB) is expected to push up its lending rates twice by the end of the year, move that will put massive financial pressure on tracker and variable mortgage holders.
